channel.title: Best GodSword?
channel.description:
Ok guys im saving up for a GodSword but my problem is I dont know which one to buy I was thinking about saving up for the Armadyle (or however you spell) but also i was thinking about going with the bandos I dont know any ideas?
My dream outfit only costs 44M together they consist of...
1.Full Guthans 2.Fury 3.Bandos Boots (which is better B Boots, or Dragon Boots??) 4.BandosGS (but see i want to know best Gs) ;) 5.Fire Cape 6.Rune Defender 7.Seers Ring/Warriors Ring

item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

[quote=“Get_Forgotten, post:5, topic:224463”]LOL so you refuse to read past the first post… Let me quote zammy for a second here

Sorry found a need to point out your mental deficiency…[/quote]allow me to fully welcome you to the internet,
hi.

now: as goatee said, the guy wants the ‘perfect outfit’. his outfit consist of:

  1. 2, 2 handed weapons
  2. 1, 1 handed weapon
  3. 1 amulet
  4. 1 pair of boots
  5. a cape
  6. a shield
  7. a ring
    (as stated by himself in post 1&3).
